org.mini2Dx.core.audio

Interface Mini2DxAudio

  • All Superinterfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.Audio
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AndroidMini2DxAudio, IOSMini2DxAudio, Mini2DxOpenALAudio

    public interface Mini2DxAudio
extends com.badlogic.gdx.Audio
    Interface to platform audio implementations
